channel.title: Staudi Apps & Games
channel.description: Recent content on Staudi Apps & Games

item.title: Dino World Run now available on iOS
item.description:
Great news for all Apple users: Dino World Run is now available on the App Store!

After the Android release in late March, the game can now be played on iPhone and iPad as well.

I‚Äôm super excited to bring the game to even more players. Just like the Android version, this one was built with Godot and all graphics were hand-drawn in ProCreate on my iPad ‚Äì a real passion project from start to launch.

item.title: Dino World Run: Moving world
item.description: In a game, the player normally moves through the world. This works perfectly for the vast majority of games, but for endless runners this can lead to problems if the coordinates where the player is located encounter floating point errors. Admittedly, most players will probably never have a run that long before this becomes a problem, but the theoretical possibility of this alone interested me. How frustrating would it be if you had a mega run and then the game crashed or glitched?

item.title: Dino World Run now available
item.description:
After six months of hard work, it‚Äôs finally happening: Dino World Run is officially released for Android! üéâ

In this game you play a cute little dino on an epic adventure through hand-drawn worlds. From the overgrown jungle to the scorched volcanic plains and dark caves, many challenging obstacles and lovingly designed levels await you. Challenge yourself and break your own highscore!

The game is made with the Godot game engine. I had a lot of fun learning how to set up and structure a game. As I had never really drawn before, I learned on-the-go how to create assets using ProCreate on an iPad.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
If you want to get in touch with me, you can reach me at any time via e-mail. I am always happy to receive suggestions for improvement or questions.

markus(at)staudi.dev

item.title: Dino World Run - Privacy Policy
item.description:
Last update: December 2024

Thank you for your interest in our ‚ÄúDino World Run‚Äù game. The protection of your privacy is very important to us.

Data collected by us Link to heading

Personal data Link to heading

No personal data is requested or transmitted in any of our applications or services

Data collected automatically by us Link to heading

We automatically collect data when you use one of our apps. This information includes aggregated user data (which does not allow us to identify you) as described in more detail below:

Privacy policy Link to heading

The use of this website is possible without providing personal data. Insofar as personal data (e.g. name, address or e-mail addresses) is collected on our pages, this is always done on a voluntary basis as far as possible. This data will not be passed on to third parties without your express consent. We would like to point out that data transmission over the Internet (e.g. when communicating by e-mail) may be subject to security vulnerabilities. Complete protection of data against access by third parties is not possible. We hereby expressly prohibit the use of contact data published within the scope of the imprint obligation by third parties for sending unsolicited advertising and information material. The operators of this website expressly reserve the right to take legal action in the event of the unsolicited sending of advertising information, such as spam e-mails.

item.title: Spritpreise.jetzt
item.description: Statically generated website that displays daily updated evaluations and statistics based on fuel prices over the last 5 years.
